R

removeCompany(Company) - Method in class businessLogic.AdminFacade
Delete company from the table Company and delete all of the valid coupons of this company from the tables Coupon, Company_Coupon and Customer_Coupon - Can't delete company if the company NOT found
- Can't delete company if the system shut down
removeCompany(Company) - Method in interface DAO.CompanyDAO
Delete company from the table Company and delete all of the valid coupons of this company from the tables Coupon, Company_Coupon and Customer_Coupon
removeCompany(Company) - Method in class DAO.CompanyDBDAO
Delete company from the table Company and delete all of the valid coupons of this company from the tables Coupon, Company_Coupon and Customer_Coupon
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class businessLogic.CompanyFacade
Delete coupon from the table Coupon and delete the id of this coupon from the tables Company_Coupon and Customer_Coupon - Can't delete coupon if the coupon NOT found
- Can't delete coupon if the system shut down
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in interface DAO.CouponDAO
Delete coupon from the table Coupon and delete the id of this coupon from the tables Company_Coupon and Customer_Coupon
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class DAO.CouponDBDAO
Delete coupon from the table Coupon and delete the id of this coupon from the tables Company_Coupon and Customer_Coupon
removeCustomer(Customer) - Method in class businessLogic.AdminFacade
Delete customer from the table Customer and delete all of the coupons of this customer from the table Customer_Coupon - Can't delete customer if the customer NOT found
- Can't delete customer if the system shut down
removeCustomer(Customer) - Method in interface DAO.CustomerDAO
Delete customer from the table Customer and delete all of the coupons of this customer from the table Customer_Coupon
removeCustomer(Customer) - Method in class DAO.CustomerDBDAO
Delete customer from the table Customer and delete all of the coupons of this customer from the table Customer_Coupon
removeExpiredCoupon(Coupon) - Method in interface DAO.CouponDAO
Delete the id of this coupon from the table Company_Coupon if the coupon is expired
removeExpiredCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class DAO.CouponDBDAO
Delete the id of this coupon from the table Company_Coupon if the coupon is expired
returnConnection(Connection) - Method in class DAO.ConnectionPool
Return the connection to the list connections
returnConnection() - Method in class DAO.ExecutorBase
Return connection to the pool of connections
rs - Variable in class DAO.ExecutorBase
 
run() - Method in class core.DailyCouponExpirationTask
Remove expired coupons everyday
